name: 7th International Conference on Wireless and Satellite Communication
content: Conference Series llc Ltd. proudly invites contributors across the globe to its World Convention on 7th International Conference on Wireless and Satellite Communication(Wireless Communication 2020) during 21-22 May, 2020 London, UK which includes prompt keynote presentations, oral talks, poster presentations and exhibitions and many more. The aim of this conference is to learn and share knowledge on Wireless Technologies. This Conference provides a forum for exchange of ideas and authoritative views by leading scientists as well as business leaders and investors in this exciting field. Outstanding keynote speakers and well known leading scientists and experts from around the globe will be expected to share their knowledge. We welcome papers describing advanced prototypes, systems, tools and techniques as well as general survey papers indicating future directions are also encouraged. The papers will be reviewed by the Technical Committee on the basis of originality, quality, and relevance to the conference themes. The conference program will include both oral and poster presentations. Abstract Submission: https://wireless.annualcongress.com/abstract-submission.php Registration: https://wireless.annualcongress.com/registration.php
